content.rendered:
Music for Peace

Come January and Trivandrum’s rock scene comes alive with music from the 70s and 80s brought back by vocalist and guitarist Nandakumar, known popularly as Nandu Leo. One of the city’s pioneers in the genre, Nandu began the annual classic rock concerts in 2013, when he felt that the younger generation is slowly losing touch with the genre. The brief was to announce the eighth edition of the concert titled ‘Back to fantasy’.
